item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: mahodder
item.content:encoded:
[themedy_button url="http://themedy.com" icon="cloud-download" label="Download The Plugin" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_blank"]
Responsive Video Embeds
Easily add any video from Vimeo or Youtube on any page, anywhere and it will be instantly responsive like this one. [themedy_media type="vimeo" url="http://player.vimeo.com/video/87292593"]
Responsive Google Maps
Add a map to anywhere in the world directly using the Google API from the shortcodes plugin. The map can include a marker and your own message popup if clicked, of course the map is also 100% responsive. [themedy_map latitude="51.522532" longitude="-0.156208" width="100%" height="400" zoom="16" infowindow_text="See! Any message you want here, such as, did you know this was 221B Baker Street in London? The home of Sherlock Holmes - pretty cool huh?"]
Social Icons
Image based (not retina) Social icons by Icon Dock. [themedy_social][themedy_social_link service="500px" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="aboutme" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="amazon" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="app-store" using the Zocial icon font through Fontello. [themedy_social][themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-twitter" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-facebook" link="#"] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-linkedin" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-pinterest" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-delicious" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-paypal" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-gplus" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-stumbleupon" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-fivehundredpx" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-foursquare" link=""][themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-forrst" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-digg" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-spotify" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-reddit" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-flickr" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-rss" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-skype" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-youtube" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-vimeo" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-myspace" link=""][themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-amazon" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-ebay" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-github" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-lastfm" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-soundcloud" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-tumblr" link=""] [themedy_social_link service="ja-social-icon-instagram" link=""][/themedy_social]
Buttons
All buttons have the option of either rounded or straight corners, 3 different sizes, a selection of usable colors, theme specific styling, plus pick your own color using the provided color picker in the shortcode generator.
Large Rounded
[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"]
Large Square
[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="straight" target="_self"]

[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"]
Medium Square
[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"]
Small Rounded
[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="rounded" target="_self"]
Small Square
[themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Red Button" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Blue Button" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Green Button" colour="green" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Light Gray Button" colour="light-gray" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Dark Gray Button" colour="dark-gray" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Orange Button" colour="orange" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Purple Button" colour="purple" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="" label="Theme Button" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="small" edge="straight" target="_self"]
Icon Buttons
Hundreds of icons to choose from, plus all the available colors including pick your own color using the color picker in the shortcode generator and rounded or straight. [themedy_button url="#" icon="map-marker" label="See the map" colour="red" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="twitter-sign" label="Join Us on Twitter" colour="blue" colour_custom="" size="large" edge="rounded" target="_self"][themedy_button url="#" icon="facebook-sign" label="Like Us on facebook" colour="theme" colour_custom="" size="medium" edge="straight" target="_self"]

Alert Boxes
With 5 premade color sets available, plus choose any icon from hundreds available and the option for a theme styled alert box or full custom colors from the color picker - alert boxes have never looked so good! [themedy_alertbox icon="user" colour="red" custom_colour=""]test alert 1 with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="leaf" colour="blue" colour_custom=""]test alert 2 with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="picture" colour="green" colour_custom=""]test alert 3 with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="remove-sign" colour="light-gray" colour_custom=""]test alert 4 with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="warning-sign" colour="yellow" colour_custom=""]test alert 5 with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="tag" colour="custom" colour_custom="#313131"]test alert custom color with link[/themedy_alertbox] [themedy_alertbox icon="comments-alt" colour="theme" colour_custom=""]test alert theme colors with link[/themedy_alertbox]
Toggles
You can select to display an icon (from hundreds available) to appear before the title directly from within the shortcode generator. [themedy_toggle icon="camera" heading="Here is a toggle with an icon and open on load" onload="open"]Nulla dui purus, eleifend vel, consequat non, dictum porta, nulla. Duis ante mi, laoreet ut, commodo eleifend, cursus nec, lorem. Aenean eu est. Etiam imperdiet turpis. Praesent nec augue. Curabitur ligula quam, rutrum id, tempor sed, consequat ac, dui. [/themedy_toggle] [themedy_toggle icon="camera" heading="Here is a toggle with no icon and closed on load" onload="closed"]Nulla dui purus, eleifend vel, consequat non, dictum porta, nulla. Duis ante mi, laoreet ut, commodo eleifend, cursus nec, lorem. Aenean eu est. Etiam imperdiet turpis. Praesent nec augue. Curabitur ligula quam, rutrum id, tempor sed, consequat ac, dui. [/themedy_toggle]
Accordions
You can select to display an icon (from hundreds available) to appear before the title directly from within the shortcode generator. [themedy_accordion][themedy_toggle accordion="1" icon="home" heading="Accordion 1 - open on load and an icon" onload="open"]Nulla dui purus, eleifend vel, consequat non, dictum porta, nulla. Duis ante mi, laoreet ut, commodo eleifend, cursus nec, lorem. Aenean eu est. Etiam imperdiet turpis. Praesent nec augue. Curabitur ligula quam, rutrum id, tempor sed, consequat ac, dui. [/themedy_toggle][themedy_toggle accordion="1" icon="camera" heading="Accordion 2 - closed on load and an icon" onload="closed"]Nulla dui purus, eleifend vel, consequat non, dictum porta, nulla. Duis ante mi, laoreet ut, commodo eleifend, cursus nec, lorem. Aenean eu est. Etiam imperdiet turpis. Praesent nec augue. Curabitur ligula quam, rutrum id, tempor sed, consequat ac, dui. [/themedy_toggle][themedy_toggle accordion="1" icon="" heading="Accordion 3 - closed on load and no icon" onload="closed"]Nulla dui purus, eleifend vel, consequat non, dictum porta, nulla. Duis ante mi, laoreet ut, commodo eleifend, cursus nec, lorem. Aenean eu est. Etiam imperdiet turpis. Praesent nec augue. Curabitur ligula quam, rutrum id, tempor sed, consequat ac, dui. [/themedy_toggle][/themedy_accordion]
Tabs
